title: Maslate
author: Maslate
content: I notice that there's no thread for sportsbet talking about NBA, so I decided to create one so we will be able to discuss and post our predictions here. I'm hoping to see more screenshots of our bets as that would say we are really putting money on our predictions. I sometimes post on the ANN thread but since posters there are more focus on soccer which I understand the most popular sport in the world, can't blame them. So those who loves betting on NBA and been using sportsbet.io as your bookie, you are free to join the discussions here. OFFICIAL WEBSITE : https://sportsbet.io/sports
